results.body: 1911 France Ratifies Morocco Agreement After a heated discussion, the France-German convention with regard to Morocco was ratified by the French Chamber of Deputies yesterday [Dec. 20]. Parliament thus signifying its assent to the understanding arrived at by M. Caillaux's Ministry. The sole article before the Chamber was adopted by 393 votes to 36.
